name: Next (itch) (LAgg)
description:
Check out some of my other games! Aml | Souls Help Floppy and Blocky to escape from the digital prison that is being held by the evil scientists who created them by getting as many energy units as possible.

Use your Abilities  to escape from the prison ! 

Try to solve the game Puzzles!

Have Fun! 😊

  • All rights reserved for Lagg Studio.
  • The game made for EIGF-GameJam under the them ("Cooperation").
  • All code and art were made by Lagg studio during the time of the jam.
  • All SFX are free source assets with license 0. 
  • Use WS or Arrow to move.
  • Use Space to Jump
  • Use Q to switch between players.
  • Use Ctrl To grab objects.
  • Use R to reload .

Development Team

  • Developer - Ahmed Mostafa (Twitter)
